right after he got the news , a truck rear-ended his car at stoplight , sending him to the emergency room with a painful case of whiplash .在获悉这个消息后，乔希的车在红灯前又被一辆卡车追了尾，他不得不因为剧痛的颈椎过度屈伸损伤而到急诊室接受治疗。

entry.def: A stoplight is a set of coloured lights which controls the flow of traffic on a road.
The stoplights on a car or other vehicle are the two red lights at the back.

means.word_mean: 1. a red light on the rear of a motor vehicle that signals when the brakes are applied to slow or stop
2. a visual signal to control the flow of traffic at intersections
